ygData.subject: Re: Wizard teleportation sites
ygData.msgSnippet: Sro is a Wizard Evac site, West Karana is a site that wizards can port to with all three types [personal gate, group gate and evac]. The south karana one [to
ygData.messageBody:
Sro is a Wizard Evac site, West Karana is a site that wizards can port to
with all three types [personal gate, group gate and evac].

The south karana one [to my knowledge] is useless, there is no wizard port
there.

besides that SK one, all other piramids are wizard ports [unless there are
some that i know not about]

-----Original Message-----
From: srutkowski@... <srutkowski@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, December 30, 1999 11:57 AM
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Wizard teleportation sites


>From: srutkowski@...
>
>
>
>Those are also wizard teleportation sites- both the little pyramids with
the 4
>pillars and the 4 spires.
>
>
>ok then how about the Pyramid tops with 4 pillars around them
>there is one in West Commons east of the lake that hums
>one buried in the sand in NRo ( The Plat)
>I think I saw one in SRo also
>there is one in S Karana with a row of skeletons next to it
>I am sure there are more
>
>>
